verses.verse: Sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> our <S%H5797>strength!<s%> Make a joyful <S%H7321>shout<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob!<s%>
<S%H5375>Raise<s%> a <S%H2172>song,<s%> and <S%H5414>bring<s%> here the <S%H8596>tambourine,<s%> the <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H3658>lyre<s%> with the <S%H5035>harp.<s%>
<S%H8628>Blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> at the New <S%H2320>Moon,<s%> at the full <S%H2320>moon,<s%> on our <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
For it is a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

He <S%H7760>appointed<s%> it in <S%H3084>Joseph<s%> for a <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> when he went <S%H3318>out<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8193>language<s%> that I <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know.
"I <S%H5493>removed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> from the <S%H5447>burden.<s%> His <S%H3709>hands<s%> were <S%H5674>freed<s%> from the <S%H1731>basket.<s%>

You <S%H7121>called<s%> in <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> and I <S%H2502>delivered<s%> <S%H6030>you.<s%> I answered you in the secret <S%H5643>place<s%> of <S%H7482>thunder.<s%> I <S%H974>tested<s%> you at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> to <S%H3478>you,<s%> Israel, if you would listen to <S%H8085>me!<s%>
There shall be no <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> in <S%H7812>you,<s%> neither shall you worship any <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god.<s%>

I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Open your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7337>wide,<s%> and I will fill <S%H4390>it.<s%>
But my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> desired none of <S%H14>me.<s%>
So I let them <S%H7971>go<s%> after the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> that they might <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their own <S%H4156>counsels.<s%>
<S%H3863>Oh<s%> that my <S%H5971>people<s%> would <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3478>me,<s%> that Israel would <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways!<s%>
I would <S%H4592>soon<s%> <S%H3665>subdue<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against their <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
The <S%H8130>haters<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> would <S%H3584>cringe<s%> before <S%H6256>him,<s%> and their punishment would last <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
But he would have also <S%H398>fed<s%> them with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat.<s%> I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> you with <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock.<s%>"
